product_name: Skullcandy Chops Around The Ear Earbuds - Black/Black
long_description: The black Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds stay in place and deliver rich audio to your ears in low-profile comfort. Adjustable, over-the-ear hangers conform to a wide range of ear shapes and sizes to anchor the buds in place for a secure fit, even during sports and other physical activity. Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds feature 15mm-diameter speakers, 1.2m cable and 3.5mm gold-plated plug.
short_description: The black Skullcandy Chops Around-the-Ear earbuds stay in place and deliver rich audio to your ears in low-profile comfort.
